metadata.title: CVE-2019-10217 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in ansible 2.8.0 before 2.8.4. Fields managing sensitivedata should be set as such by no_log feature. Some of these fields in GCPmodules are not set properly. service_account_contents() which is commonclass for all gcp modules is not setting no_log to True. Any sensitive datamanaged by that function would be leak as an output when running ansibleplaybooks.

criterions.comment: ansible: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
